title: Aeonis Span
description: A single unit of work in an Aeonis trace.

name.description: Name of the operation (e.g., function name, DB query).

attributes.description: Key-value pairs of metadata that describe the resource producing the span and the operation being performed. Allows for arbitrary custom attributes.

service.name.description: The logical name of the service. (e.g., 'aeonis-server', 'billing-service').

service.version.description: The version of the service, typically the Git commit hash.

telemetry.sdk.version.description: The version of the Aeonis SDK used for instrumentation.
